price: 这等人，是蒙他们的养主的赞美和慈恩的；这等人，确是遵循正道的。
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ صَلَوَٰتٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡ وَرَحۡمَةٞۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: ulāika ʿalayhim ṣalawātun min rabbihim waraḥmatun wa-ulāika humu al-muh'tadūna
